books.author: by Richard Osman
books.description: The fourth book in the Thursday Murder Club series. When an old friend is killed, the gang comes up against drug dealers, art forgers and online fraudsters.
books.name: THE LAST DEVIL TO DIE

books.author: by Rebecca Yarros
books.description: Violet Sorrengail is urged by the commanding general, who also is her mother, to become a candidate for the elite dragon riders.
books.name: FOURTH WING

books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: The private detective Holly Gibney investigates whether a married pair of octogenarian academics had anything to do with Bonnie Dahl’s disappearance.
books.name: HOLLY

books.author: by Ann Patchett
books.description: Three daughters, who return to their family orchard in the spring of 2020, learn about their mother’s relationship with a famous actor.
books.name: TOM LAKE

books.author: by Lucy Score
books.description: The third book in the Knockemout series. A mogul and a small-town librarian share a dark secret from their past.
books.name: THINGS WE LEFT BEHIND

books.author: by Bonnie Garmus
books.description: A scientist and single mother living in California in the 1960s becomes a star on a TV cooking show.
books.name: LESSONS IN CHEMISTRY

books.author: by Kyle Mills
books.description: The 22nd book in the Mitch Rapp series. Rapp and his team try to foil a plot by Russia without being discovered.
books.name: VINCE FLYNN: CODE RED

books.author: by Freida McFadden
books.description: Troubles surface when a woman looking to make a fresh start takes a job in the home of the Winchesters.
books.name: THE HOUSEMAID

books.author: by James Patterson
books.description: Three thrillers: “23 ½ Lies” (written with Maxine Paetro), “Fallen Ranger” (written with Andrew Bourelle) and “Watch Your Back” (written with Loren D. Estleman).
books.name: 23 1/2 LIES

books.author: by Abraham Verghese
books.description: Three generations of a family living on South India’s Malabar Coast suffer the loss of a family member by drowning.
books.name: THE COVENANT OF WATER

books.author: by Cara Hunter
books.description: Written as the teleplay of a true-crime documentary, the evidence of the unsolved murder of the stepfather of an acclaimed filmmaker is put forward.
books.name: MURDER IN THE FAMILY

books.author: by John Scalzi
books.description: A down on his luck substitute teacher is helped by unionized dolphins and a terrifying henchperson to tackle the heap of troubles he inherits along with his uncle’s supervillain business.
books.name: STARTER VILLAIN

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: Dangers develop when a drug trafficker becomes obsessed with a woman who has a mutual attraction to a D.E.A. agent.
books.name: TOO LATE

books.author: by Breanne Randall
books.description: A former lover, an estranged twin brother and a dying grandmother force Sadie Revelare to choose between love or magic.
books.name: THE UNFORTUNATE SIDE EFFECTS OF HEARTBREAK AND MAGIC

books.author: by J.A. Jance
books.description: Sheriff Joanna Brady assists a federal investigator who finds resonance between a cold case he is assigned and his family's past.
books.name: BLESSING OF THE LOST GIRLS
